title: (x) Mastercard logo - Frutiger {Nick J}
content:
Does anyone know what the face used in the MasterCard logo is called?

Thanks in advance! :-)
author: mrming

comments.content:
Custom typeface based on Frutiger Bold Italic.

Check this page out for development of mark over the years...

[http://www.mastercardbrandcenter.com/mcbrand/index.jsp?screen\_name=about...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141010121911/http:/www.mastercardbrandcenter.com/mcbrand/index.jsp?screen_name=aboutOurBrandsHistoryEvolution "http://www.mastercardbrandcenter.com/mcbrand/index.jsp?screen\_name=aboutOurBrandsHistoryEvolution")
